text.div:
Value Set Contents

This value set contains 23 concepts

CodeSystemDisplay
99504http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cptHome visit for mechanical ventilation care
99509http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cptHome visit for assistance with activities of daily living and personal care
G0162http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcsSkilled services by a registered nurse (rn) for management and evaluation of the plan of care; each 15 minutes (the patient's underlying condition or complication requires an rn to ensure that essential non-skilled care achieves its purpose in the home health or hospice setting)
G0299http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcsDirect skilled nursing services of a registered nurse (rn) in the home health or hospice setting, each 15 minutes
G0300http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcsDirect skilled nursing services of a licensed practical nurse (lpn) in the home health or hospice setting, each 15 minutes
G0493http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcsSkilled services of a registered nurse (rn) for the observation and assessment of the patient's condition, each 15 minutes (the change in the patient's condition requires skilled nursing personnel to identify and evaluate the patient's need for possible modification of treatment in the home health or hospice setting)
G0494http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcsSkilled services of a licensed practical nurse (lpn) for the observation and assessment of the patient's condition, each 15 minutes (the change in the patient's condition requires skilled nursing personnel to identify and evaluate the patient's need for possible modification of treatment in the home health or hospice setting)
S0271http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcsPhysician management of patient home care, hospice monthly case rate (per 30 days)
S0311http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcsComprehensive management and care coordination for advanced illness, per calendar month
S9123http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcsNursing care, in the home; by registered nurse, per hour (use for general nursing care only, not to be used when cpt codes 99500-99602 can be used)
S9124http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcsNursing care, in the home; by licensed practical nurse, per hour
T1000http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcsPrivate duty / independent nursing service(s) - licensed, up to 15 minutes
T1001http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcsNursing assessment / evaluation
T1002http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcsRn services, up to 15 minutes
T1003http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcsLpn/lvn services, up to 15 minutes
T1004http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcsServices of a qualified nursing aide, up to 15 minutes
T1005http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcsRespite care services, up to 15 minutes
T1019http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcsPersonal care services, per 15 minutes, not for an inpatient or resident of a hospital, nursing facility, icf/mr or imd, part of the individualized plan of treatment (code may not be used to identify services provided by home health aide or certified nurse assistant)
T1020http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcsPersonal care services, per diem, not for an inpatient or resident of a hospital, nursing facility, icf/mr or imd, part of the individualized plan of treatment (code may not be used to identify services provided by home health aide or certified nurse assistant)
T1021http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcsHome health aide or certified nurse assistant, per visit
T1022http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcsContracted home health agency services, all services provided under contract, per day
T1030http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcsNursing care, in the home, by registered nurse, per diem
T1031http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcsNursing care, in the home, by licensed practical nurse, per diem
